name: remote-serial-port-client
description: Serial port over Ethernet using REST API, WebSocket, TCP or UDP socket
author: Papn Kukn

scripts.minjs: npm install minify && node -e "require('minify')('./lib/RemoteSerialPort.js', function(error, data) { require('fs').writeFileSync('./dist/RemoteSerialPort.min.js', data); })"
